definition: lacking tolerance or flexibility or breadth of view, a narrow strait connecting two bodies of water, become tight or as if tight
details:
adjective
- lacking tolerance or flexibility or breadth of view
= example: lacking tolerance or flexibility or breadth of view
= synonyms: narrow-minded
- characterized by painstaking care and detailed examination
= synonyms: minute
- limited in size or scope
= example: limited in size or scope
= synonyms: small
- not wide
= example: not wide
- very limited in degree
= example: very limited in degree
noun
- a narrow strait connecting two bodies of water
verb
- become tight or as if tight
= synonyms: constrict, constringe
- make or become more narrow or restricted
= example: make or become more narrow or restricted
= synonyms: contract
- become more focus on an area of activity or field of study
= synonyms: specialize, specialise, narrow down
- define clearly
= example: define clearly
= synonyms: narrow down, nail down, specify, peg down, pin down
